<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"><soap:Body><RequestResponse xmlns="http://tempuri.org/"><RequestResult><?xml version="1.0"?>
<Response>
  <Header ServerIP="10.2.6.47" ShouldRecordPerformanceTime="false" ResultCode="Success" RequestBodySize="0" SerializeMode="Xml" RouteStep="0" />
  <GetEmailMLContentResponse>
    <RetCode>0</RetCode>
    <RetMsg>成功</RetMsg>
    <Subject>Baoan Hotel</Subject>
    <BodyContent>&lt;html&gt;
    &lt;head&gt;
        &lt;meta charset="utf-8" /&gt;
        &lt;title&gt;Baoan Hotel&lt;/title&gt;
        &lt;style&gt;
            body, div, dl, dt, dd, ul, ol, li, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, pre, form, fieldset, input, textarea, p, blockquote, th, td {
                margin: 0;
                padding: 0;
            }
            body {
                font: 12px/1.5 Arial,Helvetica,simsun,sans-serif;
                color: #666666;
            }
            table {
                border-collapse: collapse;
                border-spacing: 0;
            }
            ol, ul {
                list-style: none;
            }
            caption, th {
                text-align: left;
                font-weight: normal;
            }
        &lt;/style&gt;
    &lt;/head&gt;
    &lt;body bgcolor="#ffffff" leftmargin="0" topmargin="0" marginwidth="0" marginheight="0"&gt;
        &lt;center&gt;
            &lt;table width="700" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:12px;color:#4a4a4a; background-color:#fff; padding:20px;text-align:left;"&gt;
                &lt;tr&gt;
                    &lt;td style="padding-bottom:18px;"&gt;
                        &lt;table width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:12px;color:#666666;"&gt;
                            &lt;tr&gt;
                                &lt;td rowspan="2" valign="bottom"&gt;&lt;a href="http://english.ctrip.com"&gt;&lt;img src="http://pic.english.ctrip.com/mail2.0/edm_logo.png" width="119" height="43" border="0" alt="logo" /&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
                                &lt;td height="45" align="right"&gt;
                                    &lt;table&gt;
                                        &lt;tr&gt;
                                            &lt;td style="color:#fff;  background-color:#06c; text-decoration:none; padding:3px 20px 4px;"&gt;
                                                &lt;a href="http://english.ctrip.com/hotels/ViewOrder/300010649" style="color:#fff;text-decoration:none; display:block; font-size:12px;"&gt;View booking on Ctrip&lt;/a&gt;
                                            &lt;/td&gt;
                                        &lt;/tr&gt;
                                    &lt;/table&gt;
                                &lt;/td&gt;
                            &lt;/tr&gt;
                            &lt;tr&gt;
                            &lt;td align="right" style="color:#4a4a4a;"&gt;
                                &lt;p&gt;Mainland China: 400 619 9999&amp;nbsp;&amp;nbsp;&amp;nbsp;&amp;nbsp;Other locations: ( 86) 21 3210 4669&lt;/p&gt;
                            &lt;/td&gt;
                        &lt;/tr&gt;
                        &lt;/table&gt;
                    &lt;/td&gt;
                &lt;/tr&gt;
                &lt;tr&gt;
                    &lt;td style="padding-top:0;padding-bottom:0;"&gt;
                        &lt;table width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" bgcolor="#EBF4FD" style="padding:10px 0;font-family:'Arial',sans-serif;font-size:12px;color:#4a4a4a;border:1px solid #EBF4FD"&gt;
                            &lt;tr&gt;
                                &lt;td align="center"&gt;
                                    &lt;table&gt;
                                        &lt;tr&gt;
                                            &lt;td align="right" style="padding-left: 20px;"&gt;&lt;img src="http://pic.ctrip.com/voucher/edm_ico_01.png" width="24" height="24" border="0" alt=""&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
                                            &lt;td style="line-height:22px;padding-left:10px; font-size:16px;" align="left"&gt;
                                                &lt;strong style="font-size:18px; color:#666666;"&gt;Baoan Hotel&lt;/strong&gt;
                                                (Booking no. &lt;strong style="color:#0066cc;"&gt;300010649&lt;/strong&gt;)
                                            &lt;/td&gt;
                                        &lt;/tr&gt;
                                    &lt;/table&gt;
                                &lt;/td&gt;
                            &lt;/tr&gt;
                        &lt;/table&gt;
                    &lt;/td&gt;
                &lt;/tr&gt;
                &lt;tr&gt;
                    &lt;td style="padding-top:10px;padding-bottom:0;"&gt;
                        &lt;p style="padding:10px 0 0 0"&gt;Dear y dong (Account: E0002****),&lt;/p&gt;
                        &lt;p style="padding:10px 0 0 0;"&gt;请在此替换需要输入的文字&lt;/p&gt;
                    &lt;/td&gt;
                &lt;/tr&gt;
                &lt;tr&gt;
                    &lt;td style="margin:0; padding-top:0; padding-bottom:0;"&gt;
                        &lt;p style="margin-top:18px; text-align:center;"&gt;
                            &lt;a href="http://pages.english.ctrip.com/mobile/index.html"&gt;&lt;img src="http://pic.english.ctrip.com/mail2.0/mbanner.jpg" alt="" width="700" height="100"&gt;&lt;/a&gt;
                        &lt;/p&gt;
                    &lt;/td&gt;
                &lt;/tr&gt;
                &lt;tr&gt;
                    &lt;td align="left" style="padding-top:12px; padding-bottom:20px;"&gt;
                        &lt;p style="padding-bottom:10px; color:#333;"&gt;Thank you for choosing Ctrip!&lt;/p&gt;
                        &lt;p style="padding-bottom:2px; margin:0; color:#333;"&gt;Ctrip Hotel Reservation Department&lt;/p&gt;
                        &lt;p style="margin-top:0;padding:0 0 25px 0; color:#333;"&gt;15 Jan 2016&lt;/p&gt;
                        &lt;p style=" padding:0; color:#333;"&gt;english.ctrip.com&lt;/p&gt;
                    &lt;/td&gt;
                &lt;/tr&gt;
            &lt;/table&gt;
        &lt;/center&gt;
    &lt;/body&gt;
&lt;/html&gt;</BodyContent>
    <LanguageType>NULL</LanguageType>
  </GetEmailMLContentResponse>
</Response></RequestResult></RequestResponse></soap:Body></soap:Envelope>
